document_data.name: Float
document_data.mainbody: '''''Float''''' was a [[divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that allowed a [[cleric]] to levitate a large object through the air.
document_data.Effects: When casting this spell, a cleric bestowed flight upon any object weighing up to 500 lbs (226.8 kg). By maintaining concentration upon the object they could maneuver it through the air at a relatively slow speed. Its duration lasted for a matter of minutes, depending on the skill and experience of the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s this spell required a small bit of duck down.
